dk.itu.team7.game

Class Randomizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • dk.itu.team7.game.Randomizer

  • public class Randomizer
extends java.lang.Object
    This class creates random numbers used when creating the skyline and setting the wind factor.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Team 7: Mads Gade & Rene A. Nielsen

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Randomizer() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static int randomHouseY()
      This creates a random integer between 350 and 699, used when finding the top Y position of each house.
      static int[][] randomizer()
      This method creates an array containing a random number of houses and starting position of each house to be drawn.
      static int randomNumberOfHouses()
      This creates a random integer between 8 and 12, used for defining the number of houses in the skyline.
      static double windFactor()
      This creates a random integer between 10 and -10, used when setting the wind factor.

      • randomizer

        public static int[][] randomizer()
        This method creates an array containing a random number of houses and starting position of each house to be drawn.
        Returns:
        an array containing the number of houses and Y positions of each house.

      • randomNumberOfHouses

        public static int randomNumberOfHouses()
        This creates a random integer between 8 and 12, used for defining the number of houses in the skyline.
        Returns:
        an int between 8 and 12.

      • randomHouseY

        public static int randomHouseY()
        This creates a random integer between 350 and 699, used when finding the top Y position of each house.
        Returns:
        an int between 350 and 699.

      • windFactor

        public static double windFactor()
        This creates a random integer between 10 and -10, used when setting the wind factor.
        Returns:
        an int between 10 and -10.
